full_address: PTN 1 & PTN 2 / 7 Lisa Place, Mount Pleasant, WA 6153
description:
How private are these two premier blocks? With T-Junction at the top of the street and T-Junction at the bottom of Lisa Place - currently with only 20 established homes on this street.

Proposed Block Sizes:

- PTN 1 proposed 7A - Approx 472sqm - 11.62m street frontage - SOLD
- PTN 2 proposed 7B - Approx 407sqm - 10.01m street frontage - Under Offer

These two proposed R20 zoned, green title blocks are located within the Applecross Senior High School and Mount Pleasant Primary School zones, well positioned in a super quiet area of Mount Pleasant.

BONUS - time is on your side to plan your dream home before titles are issued early next year

LOCATION FEATURES:

Walking distance:
* 500m, 6 minute walk to Mount Pleasant Primary School,
* 1.5km, 19 minute walk to Applecross High School
* 1.1km, 13 minute walk to Garden City Shopping Centre,
* 1.4km, 19 minute walk to the Mount Pleasant IGA and local coffee shops
* 1.7km, 22 minute walk to Deep Water Point Boat Ramp,
* 600m, 8 minute walk to Mount Pleasant Bowling Club
* 900m, 12 minute walk to Canning River
* 1.1km, 14 minute walk to Blue Gum Park Tennis and Squash Center

Driving:
* 3km, 6 minute drive to Bull Creek Train Station
* 4.9km, 8 minute drive to Murdock University
* 5.5km, 10 minute drive to Fiona Stanley Hospital
* 9.9km, 14 minute drive to Fremantle
* 13.6km, 15 minute drive to Perth CBD via Cranford Avenue

(All sizes, distances, times, or measurements are approximate)

Easy access to Leach Highway and Kwinana Freeway

Call Michael from LJ Hooker Vic Park | Belmont (WA) on 0433 275 080 for further information
